title: Invoice generator
description: Select items, provide details then generate an invoice code for payers to use.

recipientAccount.info: This is the account which will receieve funds from the invoice paying user.

recipientName.info: You can define an arbitrary plaintext name for yourself to indicate who is being paid. Must not be a BitShares account name.

identifier.info: The identifier needs to be used as the memo/message when the request is paid.

note.info: You can attach a note to this payment request, this can be any additional information.

selectItemDialog.title: Select Item
selectItemDialog.description: Choose an item to add to this invoice.

table.name: Name
table.nameTooltip: The name of the item being bought.
table.quantityTooltip: Number of units of the item being bought by the invoice payee.
table.totalPricesTooltip: The invoice payee will only pay one of these asset types per item purchased.

possibleTotals.dialogDescription: By paying one of the following asset amounts the invoice payer will have paid the invoice in full for this quantity of this item.

itemDetails.dialogDescription: Full properties for the selected item.

emptyInventory.title: No items in inventory yet!
emptyInventory.description: You need to create inventory items before an invoice can be generated!

generatedInvoice.dialogDescription: Provide the customer the following invoice code to pay the invoice.

scanner.dialogDescription: Point your camera at a barcode to add the corresponding item.
